issue.title: [JS] verify-release-candidate-sh must be updated to include JS in integration tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2312](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2312). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I was unable to run verify-release-candidate.sh when working on the first iteration of the 0.9.0 release. 

JavaScript was added to the integration tests, but the verification script has not been updated yet

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2312?focusedCommentId=16399908) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 1751
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1751>
